messages.message:
:alarm: :alarm: :alarm:

Hi folks! As some of you may have noticed, dogfood has been slow for the past week or two. It turns out that this was caused by this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/49941), which enabled Oracle server stats polling.

However, I can't fix the problem immediately, since folks have services running on their laptops that are connected to dogfood, and these services are putting a ton of load on the DB.

:star: *So, I need everyone who is running services locally on their laptop to do the following ASAP:* :star: 

1. Modify `env-local.json` to set `"db_enable_server_stats": false`  under `"base"`
2. Run `ppy restart core` to restart all services that connect to the DB. You can also just stop them: `ppy stop core`
Thank you, I appreciate it!
